description: __Write-only__ An object containing user-defined data relevant to the creation of Linodes.

user_data.description:
Base64-encoded [cloud-config](https://www.linode.com/docs/products/compute/compute-instances/guides/metadata-cloud-config/) data.

Cannot be modified after provisioning. To update, use either the [Clone a Linode](https://techdocs.akamai.com/linode-api/reference/post-clone-linode-instance) or [Rebuild a Linode](https://techdocs.akamai.com/linode-api/reference/post-rebuild-linode-instance) operations.

Must not be included when cloning to an existing Linode.

Unencoded data must not exceed 65535 bytes, or about 16kb encoded.
